sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import Button from './Button' import { Playground } from 'docz' import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components' import { theme } from '../../styles/themes'; export default ({components, ...props}) => {`Button`} {`Basic usage`} {` `} {`Props`} {`type`} {`The type attribute specifies the type of button.`} {`type: string`} {`color`} {`It define the button color.`} {`type: string`} {`primary`} {`danger`} {`info`} {`success`} {`default`}
`} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}>
{`outline`} {`It define if the button is outline or filled.`} {`type: bool`}
`} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}>
{`size`} {`It define the button size.`} {`type: string`} {`xg`} {`lg`} {`md`} {`sm`} {`xs`}
`} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}>
{`rounded`} {`It define the button rounded size.`} {`type: string`} {`none`} {`sm`} {`md`} {`lg`} {`full`} `} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}> {`block`} {`Let the button with full width display.`} {`type: bool`} `} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}> {`icon`} {`If you to wish putting a icon on button.`} {`type: string`} {`P.S.: To more information, you must find the Icon component on styleguide sidebar.`} `} __scope={{props,Button,ThemeProvider,theme}}> {`iconSize`} {`It define the icon size.`} {`type: string`} {`xxs`} {`xs`} {`xsm`} {`sm`} {`md`} {`lg`} {`xlg`} {`xg`} {`xxg`} {`iconColor`} {`It define the button color.`} {`type: string`} {`primary`} {`danger`} {`info`} {`success`} {`default`} {`iconLeft`} {`It must be used when you want reverse the icon side.`} {`type: bool`} {`onClick`} {`It must be used to fire any method that you want.`} {`type: function`}
